bug.author: brollb
bug.summary: Extra logs displayed when running jobs on SciServer Compute
bug.description:
Logs from nvm installation and configuration are currently displayed if running on SciServer Compute: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4982789/78902806-e44cfb00-7a3f-11ea-8b07-6d25fc50f160.png></denchmark-link>
Displaying a message like "Configuring environment on SciServer Compute..." would be fine but this is a little excessive...
